Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

what does the different colors of the timer means? I saw the color sometimes is yellow, mostly at my 700 parts "Apollostyle" Launchvehicles.

Thanks

WeirdCulture

Edited October 22, 2013 by WeirdCulture

Yes. It must mean that the fps is lower, your computer haveing a little trouble simulating phisics. If i remember well you want it to be green (hmm... or white?). But if my memory is well, yellow is still not that bad, i remember it is often red to me. (Well, maybe only when i accelerate time)

When it's green, 1 second on the timer is 1 second in real life. When it's yellow, 1 second on the timer is something like 2 seconds in real life. Happends when your proccesor is struggeling to keep up, the game gives it more time to think about each frame.

There's also red, when you are REALLY taxing your computer. If you only see yellow at 700 parts, you must have one beast of a PC

I wonder what my parts limit is before i start getting this issue, i got a 6 core 3.4 GHz Processor, 16 Gigs of RAM and a 4Gig Nvidia GeForce GT-640 Graphics Card. Never seen a yellow timer yet even on my biggest vehicles
Ok Thanks.. got a fast CPU (i7-3770), plenty of ram, but only a 560 Ti with 1GB memory
It really doesn't matter how much RAM you have, the game only utilizes 3.4-3.5GB of RAM. It is a 32bit game unfortunately.
